Actions.Name: Astronomy Point Request
Actions.Description: Retrieve sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset and moon phase for a single coordinate.

Actions.Name: BIO Data Point Request
Actions.Description: The bio request is used to fetch bio related data for a point.

Actions.Name: Elevation Point Request
Actions.Description: The elevation request is used to fetch elevation data (bathymetry for oceans and topography for land) for a point. The Storm Glass API provides elevation data globally.

Actions.Name: Get Tide Stations
Actions.Description: The Tide Stations List Requests is used to list all available stations.

Actions.Name: Get Tide Stations for Area
Actions.Description: The Tide Stations Area Request will list all available tide stations within a defined geographic area.

Actions.Name: Solar Point Request
Actions.Description: The solar request is used to fetch solar related data for a point.

Actions.Name: Tide Extremes Point Request
Actions.Description: Retrieve information about high and low tide for a single coordinate. If nothing is specified, the returned values will be in relative to Mean Sea Level - MSL.

Actions.Name: Tide Sea Level Point Request
Actions.Description: Retrieve the sea level given in meters hour by hour for a single coordinate. If nothing is specified the returned values will be in relative to Mean Sea Level - MSL.

Actions.Name: Weather Point Request
Actions.Description: Point Requests are used to retrieve data for a single coordinate.
